cause.description:
"We gather here together, with joyful heart and mind. We raise our voices ever, our distant souls to bind. To remember in this moment of friendship, love, and joy, that music made together may one day heal mankind!"
Please support the St. Louis Children's Choirs today, and help to ensure that music will one day heal mankind!
